note.p: Birth: Isle of Lewis, Outer Hebrides (c 1753)
Death: His residence near Calcutta, India (08 May 1821)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1830-1831 No 1 p 10
Notes: "Mesr Cockerell & Frail" written in top left of certificate
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 1. 1731-1847' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 307-332
